Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-ALa (Temporin ALa, XXA; Leu-rich; natural AMPs; UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: the rufous-spotted torrent frog,Amolops loloensis, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: C-terminal NH2.Activity: Active against Gram+ S. aureus (MIC 2 ug/ml), Gram- E. coli, B. dysenteriae (MIC 1.5-3.0 ug/ml), and fungi C. albicans (MIC 6.5 ug/ml). MTT assay toxicity to HepG2 tumor cell line IC50 77 ug/ml. Updated 2/2020.
Literature Information.Author: Lu Y et al Lai R2006. China, Asia
Literature Information.Title: Two families of antimicrobial peptides with multiple functions from skin of rufous-spotted torrent frog, Amolops loloensis
